title: Marketplace Roundtable #46: Closed-End Fund Allocations For The Next Recession, With Alpha Gen Capital
description: Alpha Gen Capital joins the Marketplace Roundtable podcast to discuss his approach to investing in closed-end funds, as plays out on his Marketplace service, Yield Hunting. Alpha Gen Capital prefers closed-end funds due to the income flows and strong risk-adjusted returns. It typically looks at "high quality, closed-end bond funds," including taxable and tax-free products but is constantly looking for how to position its portfolio.
itunes:title: Closed-End Fund Allocations For The Next Recession, With Alpha Gen Capital
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: A conversation on positioning in today's market using closed-end funds.
